summary: A command‑line utility that loads a trained transducer ASR model, optionally exports it to TorchScript, runs batched greedy decoding on a set of audio files, and reports word error rate statistics.
business_intent: Enable quick evaluation and deployment of speech‑recognition models by providing an end‑to‑end inference script that can process audio datasets, compute accuracy metrics, and generate exportable TorchScript artifacts for production use.
